Centro Ibérico para la Investigación y L: Iberian Centre for Research and Forest Firefighting (CILIFO)
DESCRIPCION APP: Evaluation of forest fire risk and fire extinction difficulty.
Este programa ha sido desarrollado en el: The monitoring of prescribed fires and their subsequent analysis of information and computer programming have required a duration greater than that of a single research project. In this sense, this program has been developed within the financial framework of an Interreg-Poctep project and a project of the Ministry of Science and Innovation
Expuesto: Exposed. Less than 50% shading of surface fuels
Fortalecimiento de los sistemas transfro: Strengthening cross-border systems for preventing and extinguishing forest fires and improving resources for rural employment creation post-Covid-19  (FIREPOCTEP)
Laboratorio de Defensa contra Incendios: Forest Fire Laboratory at University of Cordoba, Spain (LABIF-UCO)

Mejora de la resiliencia a los incendios.Proyecto ENFIRES” (PID2020-116494RR-C44: Improving the resilience to fires of Mediterranean forests. ENFIRES Project” (PID2020-116494RR-C44)

Sombreado: Shaded. 50% or more shading of surface fuels.
bienvenida_creditos: Welcome to the "AppRXfire" program. This program is part of the monitoring of prescribed fires and the monitoring of fire behavior based on the burning scenarios and the different ignition techniques.
descripcion_creditos: The application is based on previous scientific studies regarding the behavior of different burning patterns, flash height, useful life, and consumption level under different execution windows and ignition patterns:
direccion_proyecto_creditos: The development of AppRXfire tool has been leadered by Professor Dr. Juan Ramón Molina, from Forest Fire Laboratory of Forest Engineering Department at University of Córdoba, Spain. The computer program has been developed by Antonio Vida, Software Engineer.
existenHuecos: Are there canopy gaps in the prescribed burn?
hayHuecos: Are there canopy gaps in the prescribed burn?
mensaje altura soflamado: It's mandatory doing a ignition patterns estimation before calculate the scorch height
